amendment.description: Amendment sought to authorize $10 million of the revenue generated by the bill for the Commodity Futures Trading Commission to use existing authority to limit speculation in energy markets.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in Part A of House Report 113-271 to authorize $10 million of the revenue generated by the underlying bill for the Commodity Futures Trading Commission to use existing authority to limit speculation in energy markets.

vote.text: On agreeing to the DeFazio amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 195 - 226 (Roll no. 598).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the DeFazio amendment (A008) Failed by recorded vote: 195 - 226 (Roll no. 598).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A008) offered by Mr. DeFazio.
